unnormalised: Arrey bhai, India ar Pakistan cricket match ᱫᱚ ᱑᱕/᱐᱘/᱒᱐᱒᱔ ᱨᱮ ᱒:᱓᱐ PM IST ᱨᱮ ᱦᱩᱭᱩᱜᱼᱟ, ᱴᱷᱤᱠ ᱜᱮᱭᱟ ᱛᱚ? ᱟᱢᱟᱜ ᱡᱚᱛᱚ ᱯᱞᱟᱱ ᱠᱚ ᱞᱟᱦᱟ ᱥᱮᱫ ᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱥᱟᱯᱲᱟᱣ ᱠᱟᱜ ᱢᱮ!
normalised: Arrey bhai, India versus Pakistan cricket match baro August serma gidar baro hajar baro ji phul august goroh mit́ t́hikin P-M I-S-T reaḱ, t́hik t́hik? Ámáḱ mándi t́hiḱ t́hiḱ bám bhuĺ do!
